backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, task creation/completion with rewards, balances, and withdrawal requests with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report documenting implemented app features, related components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list of high‑level summaries for major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and banana‑themed OKLCH design tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing auth state, profile setup, navigation, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for new users to set their display name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorBa: Reusable alert banner for showing error messages with optional dismissal.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Shared app layout with optional top navigation and a branded footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Signed: Marketing hero section for unauthenticated users with branding, features, and login CTA.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar that shows logo, user info, and navigation buttons based on authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identity, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend interactions such as profiles, balance, tasks, and withdrawals.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with banana‑themed light/dark design tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page showing balance, task stats, and recent activity using user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/EarnPage.tsx: Earn page listing tasks with completion actions, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Implements the withdrawal request page, handling amount validation, submitting withdrawal mutations, and listing the user’s past requests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, components, animations, and plugins for the app’s visual styling.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s state, features, requirements, and asset needs for the Banana Earn app.
